articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Taedonggang Syringe Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Taedonggang Syringe Factory
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Taedonggang Syringe Factory.
					 He looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the factory.
					
					 Looking at the historic mementoes with keen attention, he recollected with deep emotion the undying exploits leader Kim Jong Il performed for the development of the factory.
					
					 Noting that the factory is associated with Kim Jong Il's noble loving care for the people, Kim Jong Un called upon its officials and employees to add glory to the undying feats of Kim Jong Il with signal successes in production.
					
					 He went round the combined control room, assembling shop and other places of the factory to acquaint himself in detail with production and quality of products. Then he set forth the tasks facing the factory.
					
					 The factory has a very important duty, he said, underscoring the need for it to wage a dynamic drive not only for keeping the production going at a high rate but also for thoroughly guaranteeing  the quality of products and turning out varieties of syringes.
					
					 He instructed the factory to update it as required by the age of knowledge-based economy in order to increase the production of syringes systemically and produce various sizes of those products and needles for diverse uses as many as it wishes.
					
					 It is the Party's intention to modernize the factory so that it may be a model and standard of the nation's medical appliances factory, he noted, underlining the need to turn the factory into the world-level one producing syringes.
					
					 It is necessary to hold high the banner of self-development-first principle, the banner of locally producing things in the work for updating the factory, he said, calling on its officials and employees to build modern technological processes with indigenous efforts and technology by pooling creative wisdom with scientists and technicians in the relevant field.
					
					 The level of medical service largely depends on how to provide medical appliances, the main means for preventive and curative medical care, he said, adding that the Party would take necessary measures to ensure that more good quality syringes and instillators are produced so they may be sufficiently provided to the service members and civilians.
					
					 He called for directing sustained great efforts to the work for consolidating the material and technical foundation of Juche-based public health, the healthcare for the people, including the construction of more modern medical appliances producers based on the cutting-edge scientific and technological successes so as to enable the people to fully benefit from the socialist healthcare system.
					
					 He expressed the expectation and belief that the officials and employees of the factory would positively contribute to giving the fullest play to the advantages and might of the socialist healthcare system.
					
					 He was accompanied by So Hong Chan and Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: DPRK FM Speaks at General Debate of 71st UN General Assembly
articles.content:
DPRK FM Speaks at General Debate of 71st UN General Assembly
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho who is heading its delegation made a speech at the 71st Session of the United Nations General Assembly on Friday.
					 He said he hoped the session under the theme of the "Sustainable Development Goals: A Universal Push to Transform Our World" would make a meaningful contribution to promoting peaceful development and prosperity of all countries. 
					
					 Peace and security are the permanent theme of the United Nations and the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) presuppose peace and security, he noted, and went on:
					
					 Even at this very moment when the UN aspires after transformation for sustainable development, the world is besieged with wild wind of terrorism, sweeping refugee crisis due to disturbances of war and increasing global hot spots instead of their fall.
					
					 Among them, the Korean Peninsula has now been turned into the world's most dangerous hot spot where even a nuclear war may break out.
					
					 As the international community witnesses every year, the situation on the Korean Peninsula is often engulfed in a state that goes out of control, whose root-cause squarely lies in the United States which does not abandon its hostile policy towards the DPRK but holds aggressive war exercises one after another in and around the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 In the international arena at present, the globally recognized fundamental principles of international relations are openly ignored by the US-led imperialist forces in their outrageous schemes for domination and intervention while justice is criminalized as injustice depending on the interests of the imperialist powers.
					
					 In dealing with the issue of the Korean Peninsula, the UN Security Council is now playing the role of covering up the high-handedness and arbitrariness of the United States in the name of the United Nations, ignorant of justice and international law.
					
					 The recent 17th NAM summit adopted the Margarita Declaration condemning the promulgation and application of unilateral coercive measures against countries of the Movement in violation of the Charter of the United Nations and international law, particularly the principles of non-intervention, self-determination and independence of the states.
					
					 This is the common position of the NAM countries that take up nearly two thirds of the UN membership and this is the true voice of the international community.
					
					 International justice never comes by itself, but can be achieved only when the independent countries against imperialism grow strong.
					
					 To bolster nuclear force is the consistent line of the DPRK.
					
					 As long as there exists a nuclear weapon state in hostile relations with the DPRK, our national security and the peace on the Korean Peninsula can be defended only with reliable nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The DPRK will continue to take measures to strengthen its national nuclear force both in quantity and quality in order to defend the dignity and right to existence and safeguard genuine peace vis-a-vis the increased nuclear war threat of the United States.
					
					 In order to safeguard global peace and security by realizing genuine international justice and to achieve the UN-set SDGs, the old international order where injustice prevails under the disguise of "justice" should be destroyed to give way to a new international order of impartiality and justice. 
					
					 The Government of the DPRK will push ahead with the vigorous struggle to remove the root cause of the threat of nuclear war imposed by the United States, by means of powerful nuclear deterrence, safeguard the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula, Asia and the world at large and to denuclearize the world.

articles.title: UN Secretary General Condemned for Joining S. Korean Pro-U.S. Lackeys in Anti-DPRK Racket
articles.content:
UN Secretary General Condemned for Joining S. Korean Pro-U.S. Lackeys in Anti-DPRK Racket
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK gave an  answer to a question put by KCNA Saturday to condemn the UN secretary general for taking the lead in the racket for ratcheting up sanctions against the DPRK in collusion with pro-U.S. conservative forces in south Korea. The spokesman said:
					 UN Secretary General Ban Ki-moon right after the DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test had an exceptional press interview by abusing his power in which he blustered "it was a wanton violation of UN resolutions" and "the UN condemns it in the strongest words." In several official appearances he unhesitatingly spouted such extremely sinister and sordid outbursts as "the north poses threat to the world security" and "the UN Security Council should immediately take measures to stop the north's additional provocation".
					
					 This clearly proves that though Ban stalks as UN secretary general, he is, in fact, a political philistine pleasing the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group and blindly complying with their brigandish demands as he is bereft of elementary impartiality and reasonable thinking power to discern the right from wrong.
					
					 He is a confrontation maniac as he has abused the UN as a sinister political platform for slandering the DPRK, a full-fledged member of the UN, zealously pursuant to the hostile policy of the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 The spokesman disclosed the sinister aim sought by Ban in taking the lead in fostering the atmosphere of the campaign against the DPRK in the international arena.
					
					 Ban whose tenure of office is expected to expire by the end of this year was reported to have expressed his intention to run for "presidential election" due in south Korea next year, revealing his political ambition, the spokesman said, and continued:
					
					 As he has no support base and he is incompetent in politics and, furthermore, he is not aware of the situation in south Korea, he has no other way but to cling close to the U.S. master and Park Geun Hye only to play the role of their marionette.
					
					 We do not care whether he tries to seek the presidency of south Korea in quest of power after being dethroned as UN secretary general.
					
					 But we keep tabs on all the high treasons he has committed by taking the lead in the moves to tighten international sanctions and pressure to stifle the DPRK, while acting as a faithful servant of the U.S. and marionette of the pro-U.S. conservative regime of south Korea at the UN.
					
					 Ban should bear in mind if he acts in concert with the Park Geun Hye group and goes mischievous while getting involved in the sanctions against the DPRK, out of his despicable partisan calculation, he will be made to pay a very high price.
					
					 We will closely follow the future behavior of Ban.

articles.title: Delegation World Communion of Reformed Churches Here
articles.content:
Delegation World Communion of Reformed Churches Here
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the World Communion of Reformed Churches led by President Jerry Pillay arrived here Saturday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the World Communion of Reformed Churches visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates Arrive to Take Part in Pyongyang Int'l Science and Technology Book Fair
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates Arrive to Take Part in Pyongyang Int'l Science and Technology Book Fair
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Delegations of the Pugwash Conference on Science and World Affairs, the China Association for International Friendly Contact, the State Administration of Press and Publication, Radio, Film and Television of China, Yanbian publishing officials of China, Koreans in the U.S. for donating books and the executive director of the Environmental Education Media Project arrived here Saturday to take part in the 10th Pyongyang International Science and Technology Book Fair.
					 Earlier, arriving here were delegations of UK scholars and the Far Eastern Branch of the Russian Academy of Sciences and the chairman of the IrelandÔºçKorea Friendship Association.

articles.title: Stamp Issued to Mark Wonsan Air Festival-2016
articles.content:
Stamp Issued to Mark Wonsan Air Festival-2016
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued a sheetlet in commemoration of the Wonsan International Friendship Air Festival-2016, which is taking place in Wonsan, a charming port city of the DPRK.
					 Seen in the upper part of the sheetlet are letters reading "Wonsan Air Festival-2016" and its emblem against the background of Kalma Airport, the venue of the festival.
					
					 Contained in the sheetlet are stamps showing such planes as fighters, assault plane, helicopter and model plane.
					
					 The festival is held on September 24-25.

articles.title: Participants in National Meeting of Workers Active in Geological Survey Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in National Meeting of Workers Active in Geological Survey Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The participants in the national meeting of workers active in geological survey visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum. At the old home, they looked round historic relics preserved with much care, while recollecting the immortal feats of the President and the noble life of his patriotic and revolutionary family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They toured the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site from where the arms of Songun originated.
					
					 At the site associated with the leadership feats of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, they grasped that there is Juche Korea dignified with the strongest nuclear deterrence and invincible military power as it is holding the peerlessly famous commanders in high esteem.
					
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" at the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery and observed a moment's silence in memory of heroic soldiers.
					
					 They also visited the historic site associated with the Fatherland Liberation War, the National House of Class Education, etc. and watched the revolutionary opera "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight" at the Pyongyang Grand Theater and a performance at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.

articles.title: DWUK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DWUK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) led by Chae Chun Hui, vice-chairwoman of its Central Committee, returned home Saturday after taking part in the 16th Congress of the Women's International Democratic Federation held in Colombia.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations, Delegates Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations, Delegates Leave 
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations and delegates and members of the international jury left here Saturday after taking part in the 15th Pyongyang International Film Festival.

articles.title: Might of Army-People Unity Shown in Disaster Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Might of Army-People Unity Shown in Disaster Areas of DPRK
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The might of army-people unity is being displayed in flood-hit North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					When interviewed by the KCNA, Ri Ung, director of the North Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, said:
					
					A new history of army-people unity is made in the country's northern part along the Tuman River, where the tradition of army-people assistance was created during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					When they arrived here to launch recovery efforts, servicepersons set about ground-breaking for the construction of inhabitants' new houses before making their barracks.
					
					  They also offered a large amount of their rations to inhabitants in the disaster areas, giving strength and courage to us, civilians.
					
					Kim Chun Nam, an officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					We, servicepersons, were moved to see the displaced inhabitants in Hoeryong City offering bedclothes they received as relief materials.
					
					With Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un's warm love for the people, we will surely win a miraculous victory in the struggle to recover from flood damage, displaying the might of army-people unity.

articles.title: Schooling Continues in Flood-stricken Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Schooling Continues in Flood-stricken Areas of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The unprecented storm and downpour severely hit North Hamgyong Province in northern part of the DPRK, destroying tens of thousands of houses, schools and hospitals and other public buildings.
					 However, schooling continues in the flood-hit areas thanks to the devoted efforts of the party and government organs.
					
					 After the flood damage, immediate steps were taken to turn less damaged buildings into temporary schools and provide school things and facilities. And a day-and-night campaign was launched to restore the damaged schools as soon as possible.
					
					 Those of the ministries and national institutions acquainted themselves with the flood-hit schools and took measures to send educational equipment and materials.
					
					 Meanwhile, health workers in the flood-hit areas are conducting on-site medical service in cooperation with competent medical teams from Pyongyang. Many medicines were supplied to the disaster areas and a brisk preventive and curative medical care was launched.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers' Struggle Supported
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers' Struggle Supported
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The workers' strike has continued in south Korea to protest the "government's" wrong labor policy.
					 Expressing full support for the struggle, Kim Chol Min, section chief of the C.C., General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, said in an interview with KCNA:
					
					 Despite of the workers' strong opposition, the Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea seeks to enforce such anti-popular labor policies as the system of paying salaries according to piece rate and the system of forcible retirement.
					
					 That's why local media have described south Korea as a slave society ruthlessly trampling down the human rights, freedom and equality.
					
					 No force can check the struggle of south Korean workers for genuine life and social justice.
					
					 Jo Yong Chol, vice department director of the DPRK Ministry of Labor, said:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is scheming to put harsh repression on the workers' just struggle, branding it as "illegal".
					
					 It is none other than the group of traitors which has turned south Korea into a slave society of modern version with despotism and evil economic policy.
					
					 The group should be mindful that where there are exploitation and oppression, there always come resistance and that its harsh repression of the strikers and other people will bring bitterer results to it.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Emerge Military Giant Should Not Be Allowed: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Emerge Military Giant Should Not Be Allowed: KCNA Commentary 
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Japan's moves to emerge a military giant have reached a grave phase.
					 Recently the Defense Ministry of Japan formally announced that the first joint drill of fighters of the Japan Air "Self-Defense Force" and the UK Air Force would be held in the sky above Japan from the middle of October.
					
					 This is part of the moves of the Japanese reactionaries to convert Japan into a military giant as they are working hard to realize their militarist ambition at any cost with the backing of the U.S. keen to dominate the world. They are naturally arousing high vigilance among regional countries. 
					
					 No matter what fig-leaf Japan uses to hide the nature of the projected drill, no country in the region would be taken in by it.
					
					 Japan is a war criminal which imposed immeasurable misfortune and pain upon the Asian people including Koreans through ceaseless wars of aggression in the last century.
					
					 Japan is the only shameless country in the world which has persistently denied its state obligation to make an apology and reparation to those countries which suffered from its aggression, refusing to admit its crimes in the past.
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan is putting spurs to the moves to turn itself into a military giant though it is the defeated nation which is banned from having any right to belligerency or right to participate in a war and a regular army by its Constitution.
					
					 Japan expanded to worldwide the scope of actions of its "Self-Defense Forces" (SDF) which had been limited to its vicinity through the revision of the "Japan-U.S. Defense Cooperation Guidelines" and adoption of "security legislation". It is now allowed to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" under the pretext of military support to allies.
					
					 The present Japanese government is going busy developing and purchasing modern weapons and equipment. It shaped a defense budget for fiscal 2017 amounting to 51.6 billion U.S. dollars, an all-time high in its history. Its SDF is staging ceaseless military drills in the sky and on the ground and sea.
					
					 Japan has never dropped its wild ambition for becoming "leader of East Asia" with the backing of big powers. Just as Japanese public disclosed, "the ulterior goal of the Abe Cabinet is to fight a war alongside the U.S., unhindered overseas." 
					
					 In-fight tankers will be massively involved in the upcoming joint drill, going beyond the scope of "defending the territory." This fact clearly shows Japan's militarist ambition for reinvading Asian countries.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that what horrible misfortune and pain will bring to humankind if Japan ignites a war of aggression again.
					
					 Japan is, indeed, a destabilizing factor and fascist state in the East as it is creating military tension in Asia and gravely threatening world peace and security.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the UK is joining in the criminal moves of the Japanese reactionaries. 
					
					 The UK's intention to let its fighter jets fly in the sky above the areas around the Korean Peninsula thousands of kilometers away from its mainland is a very dangerous action zealously spurring Japan's militarization and helping realize its ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 The UK suffered huge damage due to fascism in the last century and was subject to disgrace of offering cannon fodder to the U.S. during the Korean War. However, it is acting in concert with Japan under the baton of the U.S. again, oblivious of the lesson taught by history. This is an act of tarnishing its image itself.
					
					 And it is as good as betraying the international community opposed to fascism and war.
					
					 Japan's above-said moves will only face stronger rebuff and opposition from the peoples of Asia and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Poor Human Rights Situation in South Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Poor Human Rights Situation in South Korea
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- South Korea is the fascist and dictatorial society where political freedom and democratic rights of the people are wantonly violated with the revival of "yusin" dictatorship, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is a well known fact that no sooner had traitor Park Geun Hye taken power than she rallied the remnants of the "yusin" dictatorial regime and her trusted stooges and established dictatorship system with all sorts of fascist laws revived.
					
					 Legitimate political party, trade union bodies and media desirous of independence, democracy and reunification were branded as "forces following the north" overnight and forcefully disbanded or shut down by her fascist suppression.
					
					 Traitor Park's fascist and dictatorial rule reached its height in brutally suppressing the struggle of the south Korean people for the right to existence as "illegal one".
					
					 South Korea is the tundra of human rights where a tiny handful of privileged clans trample down the dignity and rights of the majority of the working masses and forcing them into modern-day slave life.
					
					 More than 5.7 million people who fail to earn the lowest living expenses are under the absolute poverty line and at least 8.5 million families live in rented rooms, closeted rooms, vinyl houses, board-hovels, mud huts, etc. This is the situation of the south Korean people at present.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities tacitly connived at the anthrax germs experiments of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and decided to introduce THAAD into south Korea, driving the life and security of the people to the cliff. 
					
					 Now in south Korea youth and children groan in despair without dreams and hopes for the future.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is the evil witch who should be killed without delay as she made south Korea the tundra of human rights and hell.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye's Policy for Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye's Policy for Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye, recently addressing a "state council" meeting, cried out for "readiness to end the north" and "high retaliatory posture". Not content with this, she reeled off such vituperations as "new sanctions proposal" and ordered his henchmen to rapidly take "independent military countermeasures".
					 At the ferocious order of the witch of Chongwadae, the puppet military hooligans are fostering confrontation to an extreme pitch in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line and in the hotspots in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 Meanwhile, Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs, and other stupid fools are begging for cooperation against the DPRK while trumpeting about "high countermeasure to north's nukes" and "strong pressure on the north" day and night. The gentries of the "Saenuri Party" are peddling the outworn "story about nuclear weaponization".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday ridicules it as a bluff of the weak to conceal their true colors as the servants of the U.S. nuclear war and arrest a total failure of their policy for confrontation.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The puppet group had better stop acting rashly, clearly understanding what dear price they should pay for the tongue lashing they made, saying that they would scorch certain places.
					
					 The cause of misfortune should be rooted out.
					
					 It is very just that the south Korean people are turning out in the struggle to bury the group of traitors, clearly realizing that the way out for them is to throw into an abyss of ruin the Park group bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula by persisting in their policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The desperate racket kicked off by the Park group predicts that the day is coming nearer when they will be thrown into graves of history together with the bankrupt policy of confrontation.

articles.title: U.S. Had Better Exercise Prudence and Self-Restraint to Escape Crushing Strikes: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Had Better Exercise Prudence and Self-Restraint to Escape Crushing Strikes: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- It is an unpardonable challenge to the DPRK that the U.S. and its followers are pulling up the DPRK over its measures for bolstering nuclear deterrence for self-defense while terming them "provocations" and "threats", says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The DPRK's coping with the threat from the hostile forces with self-defensive measures cannot be slandered by anyone as they are legitimate rights of a sovereign state which are stipulated in the UN Charter, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. should ponder over the acts it has done on the whole of the Korean peninsula, before taking issue with the DPRK's just self-defensive measures.
					
					 Now that the U.S., the biggest nuclear weapons state, is posing threats to the DPRK after setting it as the target of a preemptive nuclear attack, it is natural that the DPRK had access to nukes and has directed big efforts to increasing their capability at great expenses.
					
					 As far as the cause threatening peace and security on the Korean peninsula and peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world is concerned, it is attributable to the U.S. insisting on the bankrupt hostile policy toward the DPRK, a nuclear power in the East, not properly understanding the strategic position of the DPRK which has possessed of H-bombs and ranked itself among nuclear weapons states.
					
					 It is a pipedream that the U.S. is working hard to provoke the DPRK with preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					 The U.S., obsessed with its anachronistic ambition, had better stop acting rashly.
					
					 There is no room on the earth for it to avoid the deadly blow of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					 The only way for the U.S. to escape crushing strikes is to exercise prudence and self-restraint, refraining from infringing upon the dignity and security of the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Park Geun Hye against Inciting War against North
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Park Geun Hye against Inciting War against North
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military bosses are inciting the confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north and frantically agitating the war for invading the north, taken aback by its measures for bolstering nuclear deterrence for self-defense.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary ridicules it an act reminding one of a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger. It goes on:
					
					 What matters is that those who were seeking only the place to hide, stunned by the nuclear thunder of the DPRK, are now fostering confrontation hysteria in the hotspots of the West Sea and puppet army units and staging war exercises with the U.S.
					
					 They are seeking to create the "security unrest" in the whole of south Korea in a bid to evade their ruling crisis.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the Park Geun Hye group may opt for any reckless adventure as they are isolated within and without, being forsaken by the people.
					
					 But the Park group like a frog in the well are seriously mistaken.
					
					 The moment the DPRK's nukes are launched, Seoul, the base of confrontation with fellow countrymen, where Chongwadae and reactionary ruling institutions are located, will be reduced to ashes and the U.S., too, whom the puppet forces regard as savior will not go scot-free.
					
					 The Park group should prudently approach our warnings that their racket for "removing the north's leadership" will result in totally ending Chongwadae and reducing Seoul into ashes.
					
					 This is the only way for them to escape the crushing strikes of the infuriated Korean People's Army.

articles.title: S. Korean Peasants Launch Anti-Regime Actions
articles.content:
DWUK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The Association of Rice Producers and the Federation of Peasants Associations in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on Sept. 22 demand of the guarantee for peasants' right to existence and resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 More than 5,000 peasants from 80 regions took part in the rally.
					
					 They launched a demonstration driving tractors. They declared the final demand.
					
					 That day peasants had their heads shaven and conducted information service in demand of rice price.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Praises DPRK as Most Reasonable Country
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Praises DPRK as Most Reasonable Country
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Ung Jin, a Korean scholar in the U.S. who was director of the Genome Research Institute of California Engineering College, contributed an article titled "The Juche idea makes the DPRK most reasonable" to the website of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on Sept. 11.
					 He referred to the fact that an article calling the north a country of reason was carried in New York Times on Sept.10 refuting the hostile forces' accusations against the DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test.
					
					 They should recognize that where they live is an unreasonable world, mayhem full of immorality, before talking about the reasoning of the DPRK, he asserted, and said:
					
					The DPRK is the most reasonable country.
					
					The Juche idea which is logically well-organized serves as the textbook for the DPRK to keep reasoning and every step of the DPRK is guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 In general meaning, the Juche idea is a reasonable philosophy and practical idea which teaches that the human being should be a conscious, moral and independent man, not a slave.
					
					 The Juche idea represents the reality of the DPRK and it is the unique idea that is proving successful in practice. The capitalist philosophy and economics are poor doctrines as compared with the Juche idea.

articles.title: Racket to Impose Sanctions on DPRK Will Invite Great Danger: French Social Body
articles.content:
Racket to Impose Sanctions on DPRK Will Invite Great Danger: French Social Body
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association posted an article on its website on Sept. 10.
					 The article said:
					
					 The DPRK successfully carried out the nuclear warhead explosion test on Sept. 9, its 68th founding anniversary.
					
					 The country has bolstered up its nuclear deterrence to react to the ceaseless sanctions against it and the moves to stifle it.
					
					 It has turned down the unilateral denuclearization imposed on it.
					
					 It considers that strength does not belong only to the assailant.
					
					 Therefore, the racket to impose sanctions on the DPRK will incur greater danger.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces had better accept the DPRK's proposal for dialogue rather than impose sanctions on the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean People's Struggle against THAAD Deployment Introduced by UK Body
articles.content:
S. Korean People's Struggle against THAAD Deployment Introduced by UK Body
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article introducing the south Korean people's struggle against THAAD deployment on its website on Sept. 15.
					 South Korean people are strongly asserting that THAAD cannot be deployed in any place of south Korea, noting that THAAD deployment in south Korea will bring a nuclear war to the Korean peninsula, the article said.
					
					 Shortly ago, inhabitants in Songju County and Kimchon City of North Kyongsang Province of south Korea held a joint rally protesting against the U.S. THAAD deployment, it noted.
					
					 During the rally the participants thrust a written protest carrying the stand that they oppose THAAD deployment in any place of south Korea to the U.S. embassy, it pointed out.
					
					 At the rally a representative called upon inhabitants in Songju and Kimchon to block THAAD deployment in solidarity, saying that THAAD is, in fact, a weapon in the interests of the U.S. administration and the U.S., it noted, and went on:
					
					 The Action for Checking THAAD Deployment in south Korea held a press conference outside the puppet National Assembly at which it accused the NA of turning down the opinions opposing THAAD deployment. It said the authorities are insisting that THAAD is aimed to prevent the "north's nuclear and missile threat" but it has already been exposed through the reports of the U.S. Defense Department and Congress that THAAD is ineffective in light of the topography of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The struggle against THAAD deployment is precisely the struggle against war and the one for getting the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test Supported by Secretary General of African Regional Committee for Study of Juche Idea
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test Supported by Secretary General of African Regional Committee for Study of Juche Idea
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Andre Lohekele Kalonda, secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on Sept. 15 in support of the DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test for self-defense.
					 He congratulated the DPRK on its successful nuclear warhead explosion test, and continued:
					
					 We resolutely condemn the U.S. and Western sanctions against the DPRK rejecting the imperialist aggression and interference and struggling to realize global independence.
					
					 The DPRK conducted the nuclear warhead explosion test to consolidate its strategic position as a nuclear power.
					
					 It also made it possible to shatter the ever-increasing U.S. nuclear threat and defend peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world.
					
					 Sanctions threatening sovereignty and vital rights are an interference of internal affairs of a sovereign state and a violation of the UN Charter.
					
					 We will dynamically struggle to build a free and peaceful world, keeping pace with the just cause of the Korean people, and will never step back from this road.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test Demonstrates Its Toughest Will: Russian Body
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test Demonstrates Its Toughest Will: Russian Body
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test is a demonstration of its toughest will, part of its practical countermeasures to the nuclear war threat and sanctions by the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					 The Young Red Vanguard under the Working Russian Party said this in an article posted on its website on Sept. 13.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The DPRK successfully conducted the nuclear explosion test for judging the power of nuclear warheads.
					
					 Upset by this, Obama announced a "statement" that he would cooperate with the international community to take additional crucial steps while terming the DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test "threat" and "provocation" against peace and security and "ignorance" of international code of conduct.
					
					 The "statement" announced by Obama is aimed to evade the blame for pushing the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons and save his face lost in the eyes of the world even a bit.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, the very one who pushed the DPRK to develop nuclear warheads.
					
					 The DPRK will continue taking measures for bolstering the state nuclear force in quality and in quantity to protect its dignity and sovereignty and defend genuine peace from the ever-increasing U.S. nuclear war threat.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test Favored by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test Favored by Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK separately carried on its website and paper Agua Verde on Sept. 19 an article saying that the DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test was a just step for protecting its dignity and sovereignty.
					 The article said:
					
					 As well known, the DPRK conducted the nuclear warhead explosion test.
					
					 It can be said that the test was a countermeasure to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK. In a nutshell, it is part of the DPRK's self-defensive steps to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 Looking back on, the U.S. has steadily threatened the DPRK with nukes.
					
					 One should pay heed to the fact that the DPRK has made every possible effort to achieve peace.
					
					 Last year, too, the DPRK made a realistic proposal to replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty to defuse tensions and create a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 However, the U.S. has resorted to all kinds of economic sanctions and conspiratorial "human rights" racket against the DPRK by rallying followers and, at same time, left no stone untried to stifle it at any cost while staging massive nuclear war maneuvers including Key Resolve and Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					
					 In order to protect itself from the ever-increasing U.S. nuclear blackmail, the DPRK conducted the nuclear warhead explosion test this time in the wake of its successful first H-bomb test in January this year.
					
					 This is the legitimate independent right of a sovereign state and its just self-defensive step no one can slander.

articles.title: Nothing Can Break DPRK's Position as Nuclear Weapons State: Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
Nothing Can Break DPRK's Position as Nuclear Weapons State: Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- No sanctions, provocations and pressure can break the position of the DPRK as a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					 The anti-DPRK political and military provocations will bring earlier the ultimate doom of the U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					
					 These are mentioned in a statement made public by the Swiss Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Sept. 17.
					
					 No sooner had the DPRK carried out the nuclear warhead explosion test than the U.S. imperialists and their stooges made a fuss as if there was an explosion of a nuclear bomb in the heart of Washington or Seoul.
					
					 They are crying out for high-profile sanctions after making public a "press statement" in the name of the UN.
					
					 If they show a slight sign of undertaking the "beheading operation" aimed to "bring down the social system" and "occupy Pyongyang", an order of firing will be immediately issued to the nuclear-tipped Hwasong artillery units of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army though it is not wanted by the DPRK.
					
					 We send full support to the DPRK's stand to resolutely frustrate the aggression moves of the hostile forces.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Inyectores Taedonggang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Inyectores Taedonggang
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Inyectores Taedonggang.
					Ante todo, el Presidente estuvo en la sala de educacion con la historia revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial.
					
					Observando atentamente los datos historicos, recordo con gran emocion las indelebles hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il impregnadas en esta fabrica.
					
					Senalando que la planta transmite el noble amor al pueblo del Dirigente, asevero que los funcionarios y los empleados de la fabrica deben llevar adelante con los exitos productivos las proezas inmortales del Dirigente.
					
					Recorrio la sala de mando general, la sala de moldeadora de inyeccion, el lugar de montaje y otros puntos averiguando detalladamente el estado de produccion y la calidad de los productos y presento las tareas que le incumben a la fabrica. 
					
					Es importantisimo el deber de la fabrica, recalco y continuo que ella debe normalizar en el nivel alto la produccion y  garantizar la calidad de los articulos y esforzarse por lograr la diversificacion de la jeringuilla.
					
					Indico la necesidad de modernizar la fabrica de acuerdo con la demanda de la epoca de economia basada en intelectualidad para incrementar de manera sistematica la cantidad de produccion de jeringuillas y fabricar a su antojo los inyectores y las agujas de diversos usos y de diferentes normas.
					
					Puntualizo que el partido tiene el proposito de modernizar la fabrica como el prototipo de las fabricas de aparatos medicos del pais y agrego que hay que convertir la fabrica en una planta de inyectores de talla mundial.
					
					Tambien en el trabajo de modernizar la fabrica es necesario mantener firmemente las banderas del autofortalecimiento y la produccion con los recursos nacionales, asevero y dio enfasis en que los funcionarios y empleados de la planta tienen que acondicionar con las fuerzas y tecnicas propias los modernos procesos tecnicos uniendo la inteligencia creadora con los cientificos y tecnicos de las ramas concernientes. 
					
					El nivel de asistencia medica depende mucho del aseguramiento de los aparatos medicos, medio principal de las labores de tratamiento y prevencion, senalo y menciono que el Partido tomara las medidas necesarias para producir mucho mas inyectores y cuentagotas de buena calidad que se enviaran a los uniformados y civiles.
					
					Tienen que levantar muchas bases modernas de produccion de aparatos medicos basadas en los exitos de ciencias y tecnologias de punta y seguir prestando la gran atencion al trabajo de fortalecer la base material y tecnica de la autentica salud publica para el pueblo, de manera que nuestro pueblo disfrute a sus anchas de los beneficios del sistema de salud publica socialista, dijo.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica haran aporte activo a poner de pleno manifiesto la ventaja y el poderio del sistema sanitario socialista.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion So Hong Chan y Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: RPDC eliminara causa raigal del peligro de guerra nuclear, afirma Ri Yong Ho
articles.content:
RPDC eliminara causa raigal del peligro de guerra nuclear, afirma Ri Yong Ho
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En el 71o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, pronuncio un discurso el dia 23 el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Ri Yong Ho, quien preside la delegacion de la RPDC. 
					Ante todo, expreso la esperanza de que la presente reunion con el tema de "Metas de Desarrollo Sostenible: Un Impulso Universal para Transformar Nuestro Mundo" haga un aporte significativo a promover el desarrollo pacifico y la prosperidad de todos los paises. 
					
					La paz y la seguridad son el tema permanente de la ONU y el desarrollo sostenible tambien las toma como premisa, comenzo el ministro y continuo: 
					
					En estos momentos en que la ONU aspira a la transformacion para el desarrollo sostenible, se levanta en el mundo la oleada de terrorismo, azota la crisis de refugiados causada por los disturbios de guerra y se incrementan las zonas candentes del mundo, lejos de reducirse. 
					
					La mas candente es la Peninsula Coreana que entrana hasta el peligro de guerra nuclear. 
					
					Como la sociedad internacional ve todos los anos, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se encuentra a menudo en el estado controlable debido a EE.UU. que libra sin parar los ejercicios de guerra de agresion en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno sin abandonar su politica hostil a la RPDC. 
					
					Debido a las brutales maniobras de dominio e intervencion de las fuerzas imperialistas encabezadas por EE.UU. en la arena internacional, se desprecian abiertamente ahora los principios fundamentales de relaciones internacionales, reconocidos en el mundo, y la justicia se criminaliza como lo injusto segun los intereses de potencias imperialistas.
					
					  En el trato del problema de la Peninsula Coreana, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU disimula con la cortina de la ONU el despotismo y las arbitrariedades de EE.UU. faltando a la injusticia y al derecho internacional.
					
					  En la reciente XVII Cumbre de los Paises No Alineados, se aprobo la Declaracion de Margarita que denuncia las unilaterales medidas coercitivas que se instituyen y se aplican contra los paises miembros del movimiento violando la Carta de la ONU, las leyes internacionales, especialmente, el derecho a la autodeterminacion, la independencia y el principio de no intervencion en asuntos internos de esos paises.
					
					  Esto deviene la posicion comun de los paises no alineados que representan casi dos tercios de toda la plantilla de la ONU, es decir, la voz verdadera de la sociedad internacional. 
					
					La justicia internacional no se realiza espontaneamente, sino se hace posible cuando sean fuertes los paises independientes antiimperialistas.
					
					La consolidacion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares constituye la linea invariable de la RPDC.
					
					Mientras exista el pais poseedor de armas nucleares que esta en relaciones hostiles con la RPDC, la seguridad de nuestro pais y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana seran defendidas solo con el disuasivo nuclear.
					
					Continuaran las medidas de incremento cualitativo y cuantitativo de las fuerzas armadas nucleares para defender nuestra dignidad y derecho a sobrevivir y la verdadera paz desde la creciente amenaza de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Para defender la paz y seguridad mundiales al hacer valer la verdadera justicia internacional y alcanzar las metas de desarrollo sostenible definidas por la ONU, es necesario quebrantar el caduco orden internacional en que campea la injusticia bajo el cartel de "justicia" y establecer el otro imparcial y justo.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC luchara vigorosamente por eliminar de raiz el peligro de guerra nuclear, impuesto por EE.UU., apoyandose en el poderoso disuasivo nuclear, defender la paz y seguridad del planeta y realizar la desnuclearizacion del mundo.

articles.title: Vocero de CRPP critica a Ban Ki-Moon por su adhesion a la campana anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Vocero de CRPP critica a Ban Ki-Moon por su adhesion a la campana anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que el secretario general de la ONU se pone al frente de la campana de sancion anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en confabulacion con las fuerzas conservadoras pronorteamericanas del Sur de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria dio el dia 24 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Inmediatamente despues de la prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear de la RPDC, el secretario general de la ONU, Ban Ki-Moon, concedio excepcionalmente abusando de su cargo una conferencia de prensa individual en que califico la prueba como "cinica violacion de la resolucion de la ONU" y la denuncio en el "lenguaje mas fuerte". Y en varias audiencias oficiales dijo sin vacilacion alguna unos disparates, tales como "el Norte de Corea (RPDC) constituye una amenaza para la seguridad mundial" y "el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU debe tomar medidas urgentes para frenar la provocacion adicional del Norte". 
					
					Este hecho demuestra claramente que aunque se ufana de su cargo, Ban Ki-Moon no pasa de ser un sirviente politico barato que no tiene ni elemental sentido de imparcialidad ni racional modo de pensar y se mueve al dictado de EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana. 
					
					Ademas, es maniaco de enfrentamiento que vino malempleando la ONU como escena politica contra la RPDC, digno pais miembro de esta organizacion internacional, en adhesion a la politica de hostilidad anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y sus satelites. 
					
					Ahora, Ban Ki-Moon actua al frente de la campana para fomentar el ambiente anti-RPDC en la sociedad internacional con la siniestra intencion de satisfacer su anunciada ambicion politica de presentarse como candidato en las elecciones presidenciales del Sur de Corea, que tendran lugar el ano proximo, despues de terminado su mandato a finales de este ano. 
					
					Puesto que no tiene el terreno de apoyo ni conoce bien la realidad surcoreana ni es politico capaz, el no tiene otro remedio que lisonjear a su amo norteamericano y a Park Geun-hye y cumplir como marioneta sus mandados. 
					
					No nos importa que el, obsesionado por el poder, reemplace o no su cargo de secretario general con el de presidente surcoreano. 
					
					Pero, tenemos en cuenta detallada su crimen de haber tomado la delantera en la campana de sancion y aplastamiento anti-RPDC en la arena de la ONU actuando como sirviente de EE.UU. y de las fuerzas conservadoras pronorteamericanas del Sur de Corea. 
					
					Ban debe tener presente que pagara muy caro si sigue involucrandose en la farsa de sancion anti-RPDC en contubernio con la camarilla de Park Geun-hye para satisfacer su sucia ambicion politica. 
					
					Observaremos con mirada rigurosa su comportamiento posterior.

articles.title: Llega a esta capital la delegacion eclesiastica extranjera
articles.content:
Llega a esta capital la delegacion eclesiastica extranjera
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Llego el dia 24 a esta capital la delegacion de la Comunion Mundial de Iglesias Reformadas encabezada por el presidente general Jerry Pillay.

articles.title: Llegan a esta capital los participantes en exposicion internacional de libros
articles.content:
Llegan a esta capital los participantes en exposicion internacional de libros
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Llegaron hoy a esta capital las delegaciones para participar en la X Exposicion Internacional de Libros de Ciencias y Tecnicas de Pyongyang.
					Entre ellas figuran la delegacion de la Conferencia Pugwash sobre Ciencia y Asuntos Mundiales, la de la Asociacion de Enlace de Amistad Internacional de China, la de la Administracion Estatal de Prensa e Informacion, Radio, Filme y TV de China, la de los funcionarios de publicacion de Yanbian de China, la de donacion de libros de los coreanos residentes en EE.UU. y el director ejecutivo del Proyecto Mediatico de Educacion Medioambiental.
					
					Con anterioridad, arribaron las delegaciones de eruditos de Gran Bretana y de la Filial de la Academia de Ciencias de Rusia en el Lejano Oriente y la presidenta de la Asociacion de Amistad Irlanda-Corea.
